name: symbol_strength
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_quake.
Tool description: Provides Access to the statistical strength of all 8 major currencies, across 28 Forex pairs and on 4 different time frames.
API description: Fetches the combined strength of 8 individual currencies using calculations applied to 28 Forex pairs for a given timeframe.

timeframe.description: The timeframe for the currency strength data. Supported values are 'h1' for 1 hour, 'h4' for 4 hours, 'd1' for 1 day, and 'w1' for 1 week.
